_source.text: 2. David Robinson was better than Shaquille O'Neal and Hakeem Olajuwon: Assuming this is true, the Admiral only falls behind Kareem Abdul-Jabbar -I guess Wilt Chamberlain and Bill Russell, too--for the greatest center of all-time.

text: 2. David Robinson was **better** **than** Shaquille O'Neal and **Hakeem** **Olajuwon**: Assuming this is true, the
Admiral only falls behind **Kareem** **Abdul**-**Jabbar** -I guess Wilt Chamberlain and Bill Russell, too--for the greatest center of all-time.
